name: Vaccine Blaster
description:
My entry for ScoreJam 11, under the theme "teleport".  All assets were created within 48 hours for the jam.

As the newly-developed teleporting vaccine, it's up to you to defeat deadly viruses and bacteria that infect your host!

Use "A/D" or arrow keys to turn
Press "Space" to shoot
Defeat enemies to charge your teleport
Press "Enter" to teleport when ready
teleporting will disorientate your enemies, slowing them down and giving you a chance to breathe

Please enjoy!
